assessments.status_rationale: News confirms an ongoing U.S. government shutdown affecting FAA operations, but there is no definitive evidence about the status as of 2025-11-12 00:00 UTC. Outcome remains unresolved.
No reports in today’s coverage of any FAA-licensed U.S. commercial orbital launches since 2025-11-06, but absence of evidence is not confirmation. Window remains open through 2025-11-20.
Articles discuss Treasury markets generally but provide no specific 2-year yield close at or below 4.20%. Deadline is 2025-11-30.
The performance window (Nov 8 close to Nov 30 close) has just begun, and no conclusive comparative performance data are provided.
No mention of new U.S. payer coverage expansion announcements from LLY or NVO for obesity drugs in today’s news.
No reported disclosures by U.S. federal civilian agencies of material cybersecurity incidents affecting operations.
No EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report detail cited regarding a weekly distillate build of +2.5M barrels or more.
No coverage of the Cboe equity-only put/call ratio (CPCE) reaching a 0.85+ close. Deadline remains 2025-11-30.
No release noted for the University of Michigan preliminary November sentiment. Result not yet available.
No OFAC press release on new Russia-related designations is cited. Deadline remains through 2025-11-30.
